data.title: Saturn is for Suckers by Rob Gilchrist
data.meta_description: Top 14% of discoverable projects on Coverfly. Yea, I'm from the future. No, it’s not as sexy as it sounds. I'm not even sure how I got here. In the last few days I’ve been: set up as the inside man in a drug ring, knocked out with a taser, set on fire by space pirates, and gotten one third of a lap dance. Humans are dying due to this venom crap from Saturn. Someone is raising hell in our solar system and I guess I'm along for the ride.
data.text:
Pitch Week

Apply to meet virtually with literary managers, agents, and producers.

Fee Waiver Program

Apply to have fees for submissions to top programs on Coverfly waived.

Industry Mandates

Submit to industry partners looking for specific types of projects.
